original_text: who had been carried away from Jerusalem among the captives carried away with Jeconiah king of Judah, whom Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had carried away.
korean_text: 전에 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살이 예루살렘에서 유다 왕 여고냐와 백성을 사로잡아 갈 때에 모르드개도 함께 사로잡혔더라

sentences.original_text: who had been carried away from Jerusalem
carried away with Jeconiah king of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕 여고니야와 함께 포로로 잡혀온

sentences.original_text: whom Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had carried away
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살이 포로로 잡아간
